ProductInfo.Features:
FREE 19" Wide Screen LED Monitor Included In The Package.
4 Cameras,Professional Outdoor IR dome camera, 1/3" SONY CCD, 600 TV Lines, 30 IR LEDs. Vari-Focal 4~9mm manual lens. Low Illumination 0 Lux (with IR LED on).
4 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Realtime, 500GB HDD, 960×480 & 30FPS recording, 4CH D1 Recroding + 4 CH D1 Playback
iPhone/Android Viewable, Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control
1 Year Warranty and Free Life Time Tech Support
